article_text: For the first time, hospitals face financial penalties for excessive rates of catheter infections, as well as for avoidable injuries that patients suffer such as bedsores, blood clots and hip fractures. And some big names in the KC area are on the penalty list.

article_summary:
And some big names in the KC area are on the penalty list.
For the first time, hospitals face financial penalties for excessive rates of catheter infections, as well as for avoidable injuries that patients suffer such as bedsores, blood clots and hip fractures.
